item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1075; 06:55PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 46 minutes with no injuries reported. The crews worked aggressively to contain the fire to the building of origin, defended the adjacent buildings barely separated by a few feet. LAFD Arson is on scene for the investigation per protocol for a Greater Alarm fire. Crews will remain on scene through the night chasing down any remaining hot spots and keeping a fire watch. No further updates anticipated. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; CH8; 16 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1075; 06:10PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; Firefighters are making good progress against the blaze. After a tactical pause (temporarily stop the flow of heavy streams to evaluate the fire), crews are addressing the existing hot spots. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CE13 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E288 E289 E60 E77 E81 E86 E88 EA1 EM11 EM15 EM17 HR3 PH1 RA102 RA60 RA86 RA889 T27 T39 T60 T88 T89 UR27 UR88; CH9; 16 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1075; 05:25PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; Due to a roof collapse on the Alpha side (front, address) of the building, all firefighters were ordered out of the structure and an accountability report (to ensure all companies are safe and out of the building) was conducted. All firefighters are safe and accounted for and the incident will transition to the defensive mode. No injuries reported.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E288 E289 E60 E77 E81 E86 E88 EM11 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA102 RA60 RA86 RA889 T27 T39 T60 T88 T89 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1075; 05:09PM; 6881 N Troost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PJi5AF; North Hollywood; One story, commercial building with fire showing. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E102 E239 E260 E60 E86 RA102 RA60 T39 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
TEST ONLY; INC#Edit; 07:25AM; TEST ONLY; Margaret Stewart
TEST II; INC#0320; 06:42AM; TEST ONLY; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue; INC#1656; 09:35PM; 6846 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1yVB1; Van Nuys; A traffic collision resulted in multiple trapped patients. Firefights used hydraulic rescue tools to free them from the wreckage. Two have been transported to the hospital in moderate-to-serious condition. One declined transport on scene. LAPD Inc #4575. Nothing further.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E289 E81 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 T39 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1442; 07:07PM; 10805 W Wentworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ajj9br; #HansenDam; LAFD responded to a two-vehicle head-on collision, with three victims trapped. Sadly, one was found dead inside the wreckage. Firefighters used hydraulic rescue tools (Holmatro) to extricate the other two patients for rapid transport to the hospital in critical condition, and assisted LAPD/Coroner with recovering the third. Nothing further.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E298 E77 E98 EM11 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA60 RA77 RA89 RA91 RA98 T74 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Now Contained; INC#1070; 03:32PM; 5332 E Ithaca Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lRRSSt; #ElSereno; Approximately one-quarter-acre of brush on fire that threatened one home. It took 51 firefighters approximately 25 minutes to contain the threat, with only one out building sustaining any damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BP47 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E202 E212 E25 E290 E44 E47 E90 EM1 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 RA47 RH114 T12 T90; CH5; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Grass Fire; INC#1088; 03:19PM; 4260 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQV9rC; Studio City; LAFD confirms 28 firefighters achieved extinguishment of the fire at 1616 hrs. No injuries or structure damage reported. CHP and DOT will remain on scene until it is safe for civilians to drive through affected area. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E108 E278 E6 E60 E86 T78; CH8; 17; Jennifer Middleton
